parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crankshaft pulley bolt can cause the pulley to fall off, leading to loss of power, loss of steering, and sudden engine stalling, which can increase the risk of accidents.
The failure of the butterfly valve can cause it to drop into the engine, leading to sudden engine stalling, loss of power, and costly repairs.
The transmission problems can cause the vehicle to hesitate or fail to shift gears, leading to loss of power and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Transmission will not shift when vehicle is cold
takes too long to warm up before shifting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the manufacturer to comply with recalls can lead to continued safety risks and financial burdens for vehicle owners.
symptoms: as this is a service-related concern.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering Failure due to Crankshaft Bolt Disengagement
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The disengagement of the crankshaft bolt can cause sudden loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: loud noise at the time of failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear door hinges can cause the doors to malfunction, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: difficulty opening or closing rear doors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the tie rod can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
symptoms: loud noise at the time of failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the water pump can cause engine overheating, leading to engine damage or failure.
The failure of the tire can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
Premature brake pad wear can lead to reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: Frequent need to replace brake pads
grinding and streaking noises when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the ABS braking system can cause loss of braking control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: grinding and streaking noises when braking
visible brake fluid on the front wheels.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Fluid Leaks and Low Brake Fluid Levels
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake fluid leaks and low brake fluid levels can cause reduced braking performance, increased stopping distances, and potentially cause accidents.
symptoms: Need to frequently replenish brake fluid
visible brake fluid on the front wheels

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Interference with the transmission control module can cause the engine check light to illuminate, indicating a malfunction, and potentially lead to transmission problems, affecting vehicle performance and safety.
Failure of the torque converter can cause transmission problems, leading to reduced vehicle performance, loss of power, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
A defective transmission overdrive can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to reduced vehicle performance, loss of power, and potentially causing accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
